original: n'a ya bindu pind'a rth'a /

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /

original: rigs pa'i thigs pa'i don bsdus pa /
analyzed: rigs pa'i thigs pa'i don bsdus pa /

original: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to youthful Ma√±ju≈õrƒ´.üîΩI bow to him who knows the four reasonings,üîΩthe conqueror, the concise composer,

original: gang gis rigs pa bzhi mkhyen dang // rgyal ba mdzad dang mdor mdzad dang ; / phan byed de la phyag 'tshal te //
analyzed: gang gis rigs pa bzhi mkhyen dang // rgyal ba mdzad dang mdor mdzad dang ; / phan byed de la phyag 'tshal te //
translated: the one who benefits,

original: mdo ru bsdus pa brtsam par bya //
analyzed: mdo ru bsdus pa brtsam par bya //
translated: and will compose a summary of the s≈´tras.üîΩThe characteristics of direct perception,üîΩinference for oneself and others,

original: mngon sum dag gi mtshan nyid dang // rang dang gzhan gyi don gyi dpag / rjes su dpag snang gnyen po'o //
analyzed: mngon sum dag gi mtshan nyid dang // rang dang gzhan gyi don gyi dpag / rjes su dpag snang gnyen po'o //
translated: and the antidote to appearances.

original: de la mngon sum mtshan nyid ni //
analyzed: de la mngon sum mtshan nyid ni //
translated: The characteristics of direct perception areüîΩnumber, domain, cause and effect,

original: grangs dang spyod yul rgyu 'bras dang // rang gi ngo bo rnam pa bzhi //
analyzed: grangs dang spyod yul rgyu 'bras dang // rang gi ngo bo rnam pa bzhi //
translated: and nature, the four aspects.

original: log rtog rnam bzhi'i gnyen po yin //
analyzed: log rtog rnam bzhi'i gnyen po yin //
translated: They are antidotes to the four misconceptions.

original: rjes su dpag pa'i mtshan nyid ni //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa'i mtshan nyid ni //
translated: The characteristics of inference areüîΩnumber, domain, cause and effect,üîΩthe nine modes, the three reasons, the syllogism,

original: grangs dang yul dang rgyu 'bras dang // tshul dgu rtags gsum sbyor ba dang // mi dmigs pa la bcu gsum ste //
analyzed: grangs dang yul dang rgyu 'bras dang // tshul dgu rtags gsum sbyor ba dang // mi dmigs pa la bcu gsum ste //
translated: and the thirteen non-apprehensions.

original: spyi dang dus dang sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: spyi dang dus dang sbyor ba'o //
translated: The general, the temporal, and the application.

original: mdor ni nyi shu dgu ru 'dod //
analyzed: mdor ni nyi shu dgu ru 'dod //
translated: In brief, it is held to be twenty-nine.

original: rjes dpag mtshan nyid drug tu 'dod //
analyzed: rjes dpag mtshan nyid drug tu 'dod //
translated: Inference is held to have six characteristics.

original: @100a * // de yi gnyen por rab tu bstan //
analyzed: @100a * // de yi gnyen por rab tu bstan //
translated: Its antidote is well taught.

original: gzhan gyi don gyi rjes dpag la //
analyzed: gzhan gyi don gyi rjes dpag la //
translated: In inference for the sake of others,

original: rnam pa gnyis su bstan pa ste //
analyzed: rnam pa gnyis su bstan pa ste //
translated: Two kinds are taught:

original: chos mthun pa dang chos mi mthun //
analyzed: chos mthun pa dang chos mi mthun //
translated: The similar instance and the dissimilar instance.

original: re re la yang bco lnga'o //
analyzed: re re la yang bco lnga'o //
translated: Each has fifteen.

original: mthun pa'i phyogs la bgrang ba ni //
analyzed: mthun pa'i phyogs la bgrang ba ni //
translated: Counting the similar class,

original: mi dmigs pa dang rang bzhin dang // 'bras bu'i rang bzhin rnam pa gsum //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa dang rang bzhin dang // 'bras bu'i rang bzhin rnam pa gsum //
translated: There are three kinds: non-observation, nature, and effect.

original: rang bzhin dag dang khyab par 'gyur //
analyzed: rang bzhin dag dang khyab par 'gyur //
translated: Nature and pervasion.

original: khyad par bye brag sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: khyad par bye brag sbyor ba'o //
translated: Distinction and specification.

original: da ni re re dag la yang //
analyzed: da ni re re dag la yang //
translated: Now, each of those has

original: rjes su 'gro dang phyogs kyi chos //
analyzed: rjes su 'gro dang phyogs kyi chos //
translated: The forward pervasion, the property of the position,

original: ldog pa dag ni shugs kyis bstan //
analyzed: ldog pa dag ni shugs kyis bstan //
translated: And the counter pervasion, which are implicitly taught.

original: spyi ru bco lnga mngon par brjod //
analyzed: spyi ru bco lnga mngon par brjod //
translated: The general is said to be fifteen.

original: mi mthun phyogs la spyad na ni //
analyzed: mi mthun phyogs la spyad na ni //
translated: If practiced in the dissimilar class,

original: de dang 'dra'o gzhan du ni //
analyzed: de dang 'dra'o gzhan du ni //
translated: It is similar. Otherwise,

original: ldog dang phyogs chos dngos su bstan //
analyzed: ldog dang phyogs chos dngos su bstan //
translated: The counter pervasion and the property of the position are explicitly taught.

original: 'gro ba shugs kyis rtogs par bya //
analyzed: 'gro ba shugs kyis rtogs par bya //
translated: One should understand the going by implication.

original: yang dag ma nor phyogs bzhi ni //
analyzed: yang dag ma nor phyogs bzhi ni //
translated: The four positions of the correct and unerring

original: dngos po nyid dang bdag nyid 'dod //
analyzed: dngos po nyid dang bdag nyid 'dod //
translated: are asserted to be the entity itself and the nature itself,

original: ma bsal ba'o phyogs ltar bzhi //
analyzed: ma bsal ba'o phyogs ltar bzhi //
translated: and the four positions of the unclarified.üîΩDirect perception, inference,

original: mngon sum dag dang rjes su dpag / grangs dang tshig ma bsal ba'o //
analyzed: mngon sum dag dang rjes su dpag / grangs dang tshig ma bsal ba'o //
translated: numeration, and the unclarified words.

original: mdor bsdus sum cu brgyad du bzhed //
analyzed: mdor bsdus sum cu brgyad du bzhed //
translated: In brief, it is asserted to be thirty-eight.

original: de rnams dag gis 'joms par byed //
analyzed: de rnams dag gis 'joms par byed //
translated: Those are the refutations.

original: rjes su dpag pa ltar snang ba //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa ltar snang ba //
translated: The apparent inference

original: rnam pa gnyis su shes par bya //
analyzed: rnam pa gnyis su shes par bya //
translated: should be understood to be of two types.

original: gtan gyis ltar snang nyid shu bzhi //
analyzed: gtan gyis ltar snang nyid shu bzhi //
translated: The four apparent reasons are

original: dpe yi skyon rnams nyi shu'o //
analyzed: dpe yi skyon rnams nyi shu'o //
translated: the twenty faults of the example.

original: gtan tshigs lta bu bgrang ba ni //
analyzed: gtan tshigs lta bu bgrang ba ni //
translated: The enumeration of the apparent reasons

original: mtshang ma grub ma nges pa //
analyzed: mtshang ma grub ma nges pa //
translated: is the unestablished, the indefinite,

original: 'gal dang 'gal ba mi 'khrul can //
analyzed: 'gal dang 'gal ba mi 'khrul can //
translated: the contradictory, and the non-contradictory.

original: ma chang ba ni rnam pa gnyis //
analyzed: ma chang ba ni rnam pa gnyis //
translated: The unestablished is of two types.

original: ma grub pa ni rnam pa drug / ma nges pa la brgyad du 'dod //üîΩ'gal ba dag la rnam pa bzhi //
analyzed: ma grub pa ni rnam pa drug / ma nges pa la brgyad du 'dod // 'gal ba dag la rnam pa bzhi //
translated: The indefinite is asserted to be of eight types.üîΩThe contradictory is of four types.

original: 'gal ba mi 'khrul gnyis la bzhi //
analyzed: 'gal ba mi 'khrul gnyis la bzhi //
translated: The non-contradictory is of four types.

original: mdor na nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o //
analyzed: mdor na nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o //
translated: In brief, there are twenty-four.

original: spang bar bya'o dpe yi skyon //
analyzed: spang bar bya'o dpe yi skyon //
translated: The faults of the example are to be abandoned.üîΩ

original: mthun pa'i dpe dang mi mthun dpe //
analyzed: mthun pa'i dpe dang mi mthun dpe //
translated: The faults of the example are to be rejected.

original: rnam pa gnyis so gzhan la ni //
analyzed: rnam pa gnyis so gzhan la ni //
translated: The example is of two kinds:üîΩsimilar and dissimilar.

original: mthun pa'i phyogs la rnam pa dgu //
analyzed: mthun pa'i phyogs la rnam pa dgu //
translated: The similar has nine aspects.

original: bsgrub byar sgrub dang gnyi ga yi //
analyzed: bsgrub byar sgrub dang gnyi ga yi //
translated: The object to be established, the establishment, and both

original: las dang rdul dang bum pa'o //
analyzed: las dang rdul dang bum pa'o //
translated: have action, dust, and pot.

original: the tshom za ba de la gsum //
analyzed: the tshom za ba de la gsum //
translated: Doubt has three kinds.

original: rjes su 'gro med dang bstan pa //
analyzed: rjes su 'gro med dang bstan pa //
translated: There is no concomitance, and the teaching

original: phyin ci log tu bstan pa'o //
analyzed: phyin ci log tu bstan pa'o //
translated: is taught in the opposite way.

original: mi mthun phyogs la rnam pa dgu ;
analyzed: mi mthun phyogs la rnam pa dgu ;
translated: The dissimilar has nine aspects.

original: / de dang 'dra'o rnam pa drug / ldog pa med dang ma bstan pa //
analyzed: / de dang 'dra'o rnam pa drug / ldog pa med dang ma bstan pa //
translated: There are six kinds: the opposite, the non-excluded, and the non-taught

original: ldog pa phyin ci log dang gsum //
analyzed: ldog pa phyin ci log dang gsum //
translated: have three: the excluded, and the opposite of the excluded.

original: drug ni gong po rab tu brtags //
analyzed: drug ni gong po rab tu brtags //
translated: The six are examined above.

original: gnyen po dag la sun 'byin ni //
analyzed: gnyen po dag la sun 'byin ni //
translated: The refutation of the antidote

original: yang dag pa dang ltag chod do //
analyzed: yang dag pa dang ltag chod do //
translated: is the correct and the sophistry.

original: mdor na nyi shu dag dang gnyis //
analyzed: mdor na nyi shu dag dang gnyis //
translated: In brief, there are twenty-two.

original: spyir na brgya dang nyi shu gcig /
analyzed: spyir na brgya dang nyi shu gcig /
translated: In general, there are one hundred and twenty-one.üîΩThere are forty-six to be rejected,

original: @100b spang bar bya ba bzhi bcu drug / bsgrub par bya ba bdun cu lnga //
analyzed: @100b spang bar bya ba bzhi bcu drug / bsgrub par bya ba bdun cu lnga //
translated: and seventy-five to be established.

original: de ni tshig kyang bdun cu gsum //
analyzed: de ni tshig kyang bdun cu gsum //
translated: That is seventy-three words.

original: shol ka bco brgyad rkang pa gcig / yongs su bsdoms te mngon par brjod //
analyzed: shol ka bco brgyad rkang pa gcig / yongs su bsdoms te mngon par brjod //
translated: and the total is prosody.üîΩThese summaries of the meaning of the Drop of Reasoning

original: rigs thigs don bsdus 'di dag la //üîΩ'khrul cing nor pa mchi pa rnams //
analyzed: rigs thigs don bsdus 'di dag la // 'khrul cing nor pa mchi pa rnams //
translated: are allüîΩthat I have been able to do.üîΩI ask the learned and the noble

original: 'phags dang mkhas pa rnams la yang //
analyzed: 'phags dang mkhas pa rnams la yang //
translated: for forgiveness for any errors or mistakes.

original: bzod par gsol lo mkhas pa rnams //üîΩma ha pa ndi bzod pa mdzod //
analyzed: bzod par gsol lo mkhas pa rnams // ma ha pa ndi bzod pa mdzod //
translated: Please be patient, O learned ones!

original: 'khrul nor gzhung rnams bsrang du gsol //
analyzed: 'khrul nor gzhung rnams bsrang du gsol //
translated: Please correct any errors or mistakes in the texts!

original: rigs pa'i thigs pa'i don bsdus pa //
analyzed: rigs pa'i thigs pa'i don bsdus pa //
translated: This summary of the meaning of the Drop of Reasoning

original: rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra sa mdzad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra sa mdzad pa rdzogs so /
translated: was composed by the Indian scholar Jinamitra. It is complete.

original: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po su rendra bo dhi dang ; zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba bande ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//
